item.description:
Let's join the Mass Blues Brews and BBQ meetup group at Fat Boy Bills for a concert featuring the Shadowbox Blues band. Here's what George had to say:

For a while now, I have been hearing lots of good things about Fat Boy Bill's in Milford. And seeing as one of our own will be playing there with his group, The ShadowBox Blues Band, I thought, why not start the New Year with a new venue?!

The ShadowBox Blues Band is a a six-piece, female fronted group that plays a wide variety of up tempo foot stompin blues tunes designed to get folks out of their chairs and onto the dance floor. Sure to get your feet movin and fannies waggin!! Their sets often include blues, r&b, swing and folk, featuring both covers & original tunes. So have a listen on MySpace, and I think you will agree this should be a good start to the year!
http://www.myspace.co...
Hope to see you all there!

As always there is no maybe option for the rsvp so if you're not sure you can go wait till the day of the show and rsvp then BUT SPACE IS LIMITED!
item.name: Shadowbox Blues at Fat Boy Bill's in Milford
